name: STMT_CONS_SP_DETAIL
description: This table contains information about insourced balances on your statement print and detail bill records.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the stmt/det bill record.

columns.name: CONS_SP_PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Stores the total previous patient balance for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_PREV_AMT_DUE
columns.description: Stores the total previous amount due for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total new charges for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total new payments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total new adjustments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_INS_PMTS
columns.description: Stores the new insurance payments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_INS_ADJS
columns.description: Stores the new insurance adjustments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_PAT_PMTS
columns.description: Stores the new patient payments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_NEW_PAT_ADJS
columns.description: Stores the new patient adjustments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total charges for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total payments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total adjustments for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Stores the current patient balance for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_CURR_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the current amount due for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: Stores the previous insurance balance for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: Stores the current insurance balance for all received self-pay accounts on the statement.
